Reviews.Title: Nice Windows 7Notebook
Reviews.Author: Andrew Walkowiak
Reviews.Content: I like the Samsung notebooks because they come loaded with features that are upgrades with other companies.  I have a slightly older Samsung notebook as well.  The only thing I'm not as happy with is the touch mouse is not sensitive enough, maybe there is a setting I can change?

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel® Pentium Processor T4400 (2.2GHz,800MHz, 1MB)
Genuine Windows® 7 Home Premium (32b) Operating System
15.6" LED HD (1366 x 768) 16:9 Gloss Display
320GB (5400rpm S-ATA) Hard Drive (HDD)
3GB DDR3 System Memory
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung R530 15.6" Notebook (2.3GHz Intel Pentium Dual-C T4500 3GB RAM 320GB HDD DL DVD-RW Microsoft Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit) - New
